posts.text:
Þessi er rosalegur,

Block 
Z1 Stage 2 longblock 
Oversized Wiseco Forged Coated Pistons with New Rings 
Eagle Performance Connecting Rods 
ARP Connecting Rod Bolts 
Rotating Assembly Balanced 
Block Decked 
Cylinders Bored (3.1) 
Coolant Galley Casting Flash Removed 
300zx Convertible Engine Mounts 

Heads 
Camshaft Journals Polished 
Heads Surfaced, Pressure Tested 
New Valve-Stem Seals 
Port-work, Intake & Exhaust Runners Opened Up & Smoothed Out 
14-Angle Radius Cut Valve Job Including Bowl Work 
De-Shrouding of Intake and Exhaust Valves 
Z1 HL-14 Camshafts 270 dur/.374 lift 
Nismo Performance Valve Springs 
Bronze Valve Guides

Fueling and Electronics 
Nismo 740cc Injectors 
Twin Turbo Fuel Pump 
Apexi AVCR Boost Controller 
Greddy Turbo Timer 
Z1 EPROM Upgrade 
Tien EDFC Controler 

Exhaust and Drivetrain 
2.5" Z1 5-Bolt Split Down-Pipes 
2.5" Z1 Test-Pipes 
JWT Genie Cat-back Exhaust System 
RPS Carbon Carbon Clutch and Flywheel 
New 97' J-Spec Tranny 
Steel Braided Clutch Line 
Z-1 One Piece Drive Shaft 

Suspension 
Tien Flex Type Coilovers 
Powertrix Upper Adjustable Arms Front and Rear 
Powertrix Adjustable Tention Rods 
Stillen Sway Bars Front and Rear 

Wheels, Brakes, and Body 
Braided SS Brake Lines 
Brembo Cross Drilled & Slotted Rotors (Rear 11.25") 
Z-1 Big Brake Kit (Front 13") 
Hawk Brake Pads 
Urethane Greddy Gracer Replica Bumper 
Veilside C-1 Sideskirts and Rear Valance 
Stillen Rear Wing 
J-Spec Tail Lights and Smoked Corner Lenses 
Volk GT-C 19-9 ½ Front 19-10 ½ Rear Wrapped in Toyo Rubber



















Rosalegur
heeelvíti fallegur skítt með vélina myndi ekki nota hana til fulls ef ég ætti þetta  <<<icon_eek.gif>>>  mundi ekki tíma því .

Flottur þessi...hann fær aukastig hjá mér fyrir að vera 2ja sæta týpan :wink: 
finnst þeir mun flottari <<<icon_cool.gif>>>

Jamm hann er geðveikur þessi.
Pían á neðsu myndinni á hann.
